features: Nub's Wide Neck Bottle has a Soft Flex Silicone Nipple and Anti-Colic Air System.
The Medium Flow wide neck bottle is ideal for children 3 months old.
The 9oz bottle also has a printed measuring system on it so that parents can easily measure servings.

body.description: Nub's Wide Neck Bottle has a Soft Flex Silicone Nipple and Anti-Colic Air System. The Medium Flow wide neck bottle is ideal for children 3+ months old. The 9oz bottle also has a printed measuring system on it so that parents can easily measure servings. BPA Free.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Disassemble all parts before washing. Wash in warm water using mild soap. Rinse thoroughly with clean water. Dry thoroughly. Top rack of dishwasher safe. Do not boil. Do not steam sterlize.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features Fun Colors & Prints The Wide Neck Bottle is available in 6 fun colors and prints that your little one is sure to love. Soft Flex Silicone Nipple - Medium Flow The Soft Flex soft silicone medium flow nipple is recommended for babies 3-6 months. Anti-Colic Air System With Your Baby's Comfort In Mind An Anti-Colic Feature Was Designed In The Nipple, Helping To Prevent Ingestion Of Air By Baby, Which May Cause Colic.

Product Features Hygienic Cover The Wide Neck Bottle come with a hygienic cover to keep the nipple clean when not in use and ideal for travel! Liquid Measurement Markings- oz & ml Liquid measurement markings on the base of the cup allow you to know how much liquid your baby has consumed. The Wide Neck Bottles holds 9 oz / 270 ml. Easy to Hold The bottle's contoured base allows your baby to get a firm grip while drinking.

Nuby Garden Fresh Fruitsicle Frozen Pop Tray - 4 Molds Nuby Garden Fresh Squeeze Feeder Nuby All Silicone Tuggy Teething Ball Age Guidace: 6 M+ 6 M+ 3 M+ Quick Facts: Nuby Fruitsicles are great for making your baby Fruitsicles at home. Perfectly shaped for small hands and the clever design catches any drips. Ideal for fresh homemade puree Fruitsicles that can be used for teething babies to help sooth gums. Ideal for rices and purees. Holds approx. 3 oz / 90 ml. Gently squeeze to fill spoon. Perfect for on the go! The super soft teether's unique textured design provides comfort to baby's delicate gums. The teether provides stimulus to the lips and tongue to assist in the eruption of teeth by gently massaging baby's gums.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the quality, the fast shipping and the seller is just awesome!!!!!! Thank you!!!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Very fast shipping! Love these bottles for my little one. It'd the only kind my little one will use. I love that they ship SO quickly and if there is an issue they have great customer service!!!!! Thank God for them. This is the ONLY place I've been able to find this bottle anywhere....because you know of course it's the only one my little one wants. Hahahaha.......but normally I'll order a new one if my little one uses their teeth to puncture a hole in it....and if I order it by a certain time of day, I'll have it very next day. Otherwise it will be here very early the following day. Not to mention the bottles are just awesome quality and they hold up SOOOOOOOO well and last such a long time!!! Thank you so much!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewerName: Yo lo compre pero noda los resultados q dice no lo bulbo a comprar por esta caro y no da los resultados q promete
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast flow but good
reviews.reviewText: These are pretty awesome for the price. They are faster flow nipples so better for babies over 3 months for sure. Super easy to clean which is my favorite part. I throw the bottle and ring in the dishwasher and wash the nipple by hand. So much easier than those darn Dr. Browns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these bottles!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these bottles for breast milk and later cows milk! They held up and were extremely easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Description not detailed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my daughter loves these
reviews.reviewText: i found these at Target and bought them on a whim. *i tend to be a bottle hoarder lol* it's hard to find a wide neck bottle that isn't so huge. the size is just right for her to hold and she has no problems with the nipple or being gassy from these. Started at 9 mths. Sadly they are sold at Target anymore or pretty much anywhere else i've tried looking. Thank god for Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bottle.... Unfortunately wont allow you to choose color
reviews.reviewText: This is the only bottle my son will drink from, first found this bottle at local department store then they stopped carrying them, so turned to amazon to buy a new one. This is now my second time buying it and my only issue with this, is that when purchasing it doesnt give you the option to choose a color it just says multi color, and I now for the second time in a row recieved a PINK bottle for my little boy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Easy to wash and great for the price
